intro: This is an interactive educational website for children and parents
siteDescription: Your guide to conscious parenting and a healthy home
selectUserTypeSubtitle: Who will be using Catalog today?
aboutText: We are an educational platform specialized in providing interactive educational content for children and parents.
aboutSection1Text: We are a group of 11 fourth-year students in the Department of Public Relations and Advertising at the International Higher Institute for Media. We are an awareness campaign that seeks to empower parents with more conscious and balanced parenting. Our campaign vision is to contribute to building aware and psychologically balanced families, where parents heal from their internal wounds so children can grow up in a safe, supportive environment based on awareness and respect. Our campaign mission is to raise awareness about the importance of healing psychological wounds in parents as an essential step for conscious parenting, through the interactive Catalog application that provides simple, reliable, and practical content that helps families understand themselves, improve their relationship with their children, and raise a more conscious, balanced, and mentally healthy generation.
aboutSection2Text: To contribute to building aware and psychologically balanced families, where parents begin healing from their internal wounds so children can grow up in a safe, supportive environment based on awareness and respect.
aboutSection3Text: To raise awareness about the importance of healing psychological wounds in parents as an essential step for conscious parenting, through the interactive Catalog application that provides simple, reliable, and practical content that helps families understand themselves, improve their relationship with their children, and raise a more conscious, balanced, and mentally healthy generation.
aboutMission1: Interactive educational content specifically designed for children at different age stages
aboutMission2: Fun educational games that help develop cognitive and creative skills
aboutMission3: Educational resources for parents to help them understand their children's needs and support their growth
aboutMission4: Specialized consultations with experts in education and child development
aboutMission5: A comprehensive library of educational and awareness videos and books
aboutSection4Text: At Catalog, we offer a unique experience characterized by:
aboutFeature1: The first specialized Egyptian website about healing wounds and conscious parenting
aboutFeature2: Reliable, practical, and simplified content that is easy to understand and apply
aboutFeature3: Specialized support for families on their healing and conscious parenting journey
aboutFeature5: Specialized resources that help parents understand themselves and improve their relationship with their children
contactText: You can contact us via email or phone.
contactSubtitle: We are here to help you and answer all your inquiries

contactHoursValue: Saturday to Thursday: 9 AM to 5 PM
contactSection2Text: Your opinion matters to us! If you have any suggestions or feedback about Catalog, or if you encounter any technical issues, please don't hesitate to contact us. Our team is ready to help you at any time.
contactSection3Text: Follow us on social media to get the latest news and updates:
content: This is temporary content. It will be updated later.
safeEnvDesc: A safe space for the entire family. We provide an environment that respects the privacy of children and parents, and supports safe expression of emotions without judgment or pressure.
available247Desc: Because emotions don't come on schedule... Catalog is available for you and your child throughout the day.
easyUseDesc: An easy-to-use interface suitable for children, fathers, and mothers on various devices.
dashChildProgressDesc: Keep learning to unlock even more progress!
dashAddChildDesc: Create an account for another child.
dashChildColorsDesc: Learn colors and shapes in a fun way.
dashChildGamesDesc: Educational games to boost thinking skills.
dashChildStoriesDesc: Fun and meaningful stories before sleep.
specialistDesc: Connect with specialists in education and child development.
awarenessVideosDesc: A comprehensive library of educational and awareness videos for parents.
awarenessBooksDesc: A diverse collection of specialized educational and awareness books.
childPsychologistDesc: Specialized psychological consultations to support your child's mental health
familyVideosDesc: Educational videos about family for children
coloringGameInstructions: Click on a shape then select a color to fill it. Enjoy coloring!
puzzleInstructions: Click on tiles adjacent to the empty space to move them. Your goal is to arrange numbers from 1 to 8.
matchingGameInstructions: Click on cards to flip them and find matching pairs. Try to find all pairs with the least number of attempts!
